Home.title: tunci - Aynuitak or un tupte easkay aeywankep
Home.description: tan sait anakne Aynuitak or wa Sisam’itak a=nuye easkay aeywankep ne ruwe ne.

AboutPage.title: tanpe hemanta an?
AboutPage.description: tan sait anakne Aynuitak or wa Sisam’itak a=nuye easkay aeywankep ne ruwe ne.

Composer.char_max: {max} monci or ta {current} monci e=eywanke wa e=an.
Composer.wip: naa ci=kar kor oka=as hontom ne ruwe ne.

PronounSelector.title: itakpo
PronounSelector.description: Aynuitak or ta tu sinna itak a=eywanke ruwe ne: yukar or ta a=eywanke itak, yayan hi ta a=eywanke itak. hi kusu, inan itak pirka ya ka e=numke easkay ruwe ne.

DialectSelector.title: iporse
DialectSelector.description: Aynuitak or ta hiyocunko sak kusu, usa mosir or ta sinna itak a=eywanke wa oka ruwe ne. mosir e=numke wa ne mosir or ta a=eywanke wa oka itak e=kar easkay ruwe ne.

Disclaimer.title: yaytupare yan
Disclaimer.disclaimer: sinna itak, wen itak a=kar hi ka oka=an nankor. kusu, tane oka Aynuitak erampewtek utar anakne iteki opitta eysokor yan. Aynuitak pirkano ye kur eci=kopisi yak pirka nankor.

ExampleSentences.exampleSentences: ne itak eywanke wa oka oruspe

AlternativeTranslations.description: mosma anakne, ene itakpo ka oka hi:
